name: ActofKindness
0:
”Alexa, open Act of Kindness”
”Alexa, ask Act of Kindness to suggest an act”
”Alexa, open Act of Kindness and tell me a kindness idea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: act of kindness
des: Add kindness easily to your daily routine with this skill. Make a positive change in your life and the lives of others. Start each day by saying, "Alexa, open Act of Kindness", "Alex, open Act of Kindness and suggest an act" or "Alexa, open Act of Kindness and tell me a kindness idea".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
